verses.verse: וַיִּקָּבְצ֧וּ <WH6908> gathered כָֽל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> Then all Israel אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִ֖יד <WH1732> themselves to David חֶבְר֣וֹנָה <WH2275> unto Hebron לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying הִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> Behold עַצְמְךָ֥ <WH6106> Behold we [are] thy bone וּֽבְשָׂרְךָ֖ <WH1320> and thy flesh אֲנָֽחְנוּ׃ <WH587> we

גַּם־ <WH1571> over my people תְּמ֣וֹל <WH8543> And moreover in time גַּם־ <WH1571> even שִׁלְשׁ֗וֹם <WH8032> past גַּ֚ם <WH1571> even בִּהְי֣וֹת <WH1961> become שָׁא֣וּל <WH7586> even when Saul מֶ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> was king אַתָּ֛ה <WH859> who הַמּוֹצִ֥יא <WH3318> thou [wast] he that leddest out וְהַמֵּבִ֖יא <WH935> and broughtest in אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> Israel וַיֹּאמֶר֩ <WH559> said יְהוָ֨ה <WH3068> and the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֜יךָ <WH430> thy God לְךָ֗ אַתָּ֨ה <WH859> You תִרְעֶ֤ה <WH7462> unto thee Thou shalt feed אֶת־ <WH853> עַמִּי֙ <WH5971> my people אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> Israel וְאַתָּה֙ <WH859> you תִּהְיֶ֣ה <WH1961> become נָגִ֔יד <WH5057> and thou shalt be ruler עַ֖ל <WH5921> over עַמִּ֥י <WH5971> my people יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Israel

וַ֠יָּבֹאוּ <WH935> Therefore came כָּל־ <WH3605> all זִקְנֵ֨י <WH2205> all the elders יִשְׂרָאֵ֤ל <WH3478> of Israel אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> to the king חֶבְר֔וֹנָה <WH2275> to Hebron וַיִּכְרֹת֩ <WH3772> made לָהֶ֨ם דָּוִ֥יד <WH1732> and David בְּרִ֛ית <WH1285> a covenant בְּחֶבְר֖וֹן <WH2275> with them in Hebron לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וַיִּמְשְׁח֨וּ <WH4886> and they anointed אֶת־ <WH853> דָּוִ֤יד <WH1732> David לְמֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> king עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> over Israel כִּדְבַ֥ר <WH1697> according to the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּיַד־ <WH3027> by שְׁמוּאֵֽל׃ <WH8050> Samuel ס

וַיֵּ֨לֶךְ <WH1980> went דָּוִ֧יד <WH1732> And David וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <WH3478> and all Israel יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <WH3389> to Jerusalem הִ֣יא <WH1931> he יְב֑וּס <WH2982> which [is] Jebus וְשָׁם֙ <WH8033> there הַיְבוּסִ֔י <WH2983> where the Jebusites יֹשְׁבֵ֖י <WH3427> [were] the inhabitants הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the land

וַיֹּ֨אמְר֜וּ <WH559> said יֹשְׁבֵ֤י <WH3427> And the inhabitants יְבוּס֙ <WH2982> of Jebus לְדָוִ֔יד <WH1732> to David לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תָב֖וֹא <WH935> Thou shalt not come הֵ֑נָּה <WH2008> here וַיִּלְכֹּ֤ד <WH3920> took דָּוִיד֙ <WH1732> hither Nevertheless David אֶת־ <WH853> מְצֻדַ֣ת <WH4686> the castle צִיּ֔וֹן <WH6726> of Zion הִ֖יא <WH1931> he עִ֥יר <WH5892> which [is] the city דָּוִֽיד׃ <WH1732> of David

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said דָּוִ֔יד <WH1732> And David כָּל־ <WH3605> Whoever מַכֵּ֤ה <WH5221> Whosoever smiteth יְבוּסִי֙ <WH2983> the Jebusites בָּרִ֣אשׁוֹנָ֔ה <WH7223> first יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> became לְרֹ֖אשׁ <WH7218> shall be chief וּלְשָׂ֑ר <WH8269> and captain וַיַּ֧עַל <WH5927> up בָּרִאשׁוֹנָ֛ה <WH7223> first יוֹאָ֥ב <WH3097> So Joab בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son צְרוּיָ֖ה <WH6870> of Zeruiah וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> became לְרֹֽאשׁ׃ <WH7218> and was chief

וַיֵּ֥שֶׁב <WH3427> dwelt דָּוִ֖יד <WH1732> And David בַּמְצָ֑ד <WH4679> in the castle עַל־ <WH5921> and כֵּ֥ן <WH3651> it was קָרְאוּ־ <WH7121> therefore they called ל֖וֹ עִ֥יר <WH5892> it the city דָּוִֽיד׃ <WH1732> of David

וַיִּ֤בֶן <WH1129> And he built הָעִיר֙ <WH5892> the city מִסָּבִ֔יב <WH5439> round about מִן־ <WH4480> from הַמִּלּ֖וֹא <WH4407> even from Millo וְעַד־ <WH5704> against הַסָּבִ֑יב <WH5439> round about וְיוֹאָ֕ב <WH3097> and Joab יְחַיֶּ֖ה <WH2421> repaired אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁאָ֥ר <WH7605> the rest הָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> of the city
וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> greater דָּוִ֖יד <WH1732> So David הָל֣וֹךְ <WH1980> greater וְגָד֑וֹל <WH1419> and greater וַיהוָ֥ה <WH3068> for the LORD צְבָא֖וֹת <WH6635> of hosts עִמּֽוֹ׃ <WH5973> with פ

וְאֵ֨לֶּה <WH428> now these רָאשֵׁ֤י <WH7218> These also [are] the chief הַגִּבּוֹרִים֙ <WH1368> of the mighty men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom לְדָוִ֔יד <WH1732> whom David הַמִּתְחַזְּקִ֨ים <WH2388> had who strengthened עִמּ֧וֹ <WH5973> together בְמַלְכוּת֛וֹ <WH4438> themselves with him in his kingdom עִם־ <WH5973> together כָּל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> [and] with all Israel לְהַמְלִיכ֑וֹ <WH4427> to make him king כִּדְבַ֥ר <WH1697> according to the word יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD עַל־ <WH5921> concerning יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> concerning Israel ס

וְאֵ֛לֶּה <WH428> These מִסְפַּ֥ר <WH4557> And this [is] the number הַגִּבֹּרִ֖ים <WH1368> of the mighty men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom לְדָוִ֑יד <WH1732> whom David יָשָׁבְעָ֣ם <WH3434> had Jashobeam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son חַכְמוֹנִ֗י <WH2453> an Hachmonite רֹ֚אשׁ <WH7218> the chief [הַשְּׁלֹושִׁים כ] (הַשָּׁ֣לִישִׁ֔ים <WH7970> thirty ק) הֽוּא־ <WH1931> he עוֹרֵ֧ר <WH5782> he lifted up אֶת־ <WH853> חֲנִית֛וֹ <WH2595> his spear עַל־ <WH5921> against שְׁלֹשׁ־ <WH7969> against three מֵא֥וֹת <WH3967> hundred חָלָ֖ל <WH2491> slain בְּפַ֥עַם <WH6471> time אֶחָֽת׃ <WH259> [by him] at one

וְאַחֲרָ֛יו <WH310> And after אֶלְעָזָ֥ר <WH499> him [was] Eleazar בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son דּוֹד֖וֹ <WH1734> of Dodo הָאֲחוֹחִ֑י <WH266> the Ahohite ה֖וּא <WH1931> who בִּשְׁלוֹשָׁ֥ה <WH7969> who [was one] of the three הַגִּבֹּרִֽים׃ <WH1368> mighties

הֽוּא־ <WH1931> he הָיָ֨ה <WH1961> become עִם־ <WH5973> was with דָּוִ֜יד <WH1732> He was with David בַּפַּ֣ס דַּמִּ֗ים <WH6450> at Pasdammim וְהַפְּלִשְׁתִּים֙ <WH6430> and there the Philistines נֶאֱסְפוּ־ <WH622> were gathered together שָׁ֣ם <WH8033> there לַמִּלְחָמָ֔ה <WH4421> to battle וַתְּהִ֛י <WH1961> and there was חֶלְקַ֥ת <WH2513> where was a parcel הַשָּׂדֶ֖ה <WH7704> of ground מְלֵאָ֣ה <WH4392> full שְׂעוֹרִ֑ים <WH8184> of barley וְהָעָ֥ם <WH5971> and the people נָ֖סוּ <WH5127> fled מִפְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> from before פְלִשְׁתִּֽים׃ <WH6430> the Philistines

וַיִּֽתְיַצְּב֤וּ <WH3320> And they set בְתוֹךְ־ <WH8432> themselves in the midst הַחֶלְקָה֙ <WH2513> of [that] parcel וַיַּצִּיל֔וּהָ <WH5337> and delivered וַיַּכּ֖וּ <WH5221> it and slew אֶת־ <WH853> פְּלִשְׁתִּ֑ים <WH6430> the Philistines וַיּ֥וֹשַׁע <WH3467> saved יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> and the LORD תְּשׁוּעָ֥ה <WH8668> deliverance גְדוֹלָֽה׃ <WH1419> [them] by a great

וַיֵּרְד֡וּ <WH3381> went down שְֽׁלוֹשָׁה֩ <WH7969> Now three מִן־ <WH4480> at הַשְּׁלוֹשִׁ֨ים <WH7970> of the thirty רֹ֤אשׁ <WH7218> captains עַל־ <WH5921> unto הַצֻּר֙ <WH6697> to the rock אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִ֔יד <WH1732> to David אֶל־ <WH413> into מְעָרַ֖ת <WH4631> into the cave עֲדֻלָּ֑ם <WH5725> of Adullam וּמַחֲנֵ֣ה <WH4264> and the host פְלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> of the Philistines חֹנָ֖ה <WH2583> encamped בְּעֵ֥מֶק <WH6010> in the valley רְפָאִֽים׃ <WH7497> of Rephaim

וְדָוִ֖יד <WH1732> And David אָ֣ז <WH227> was then בַּמְּצוּדָ֑ה <WH4686> [was] then in the hold וּנְצִ֣יב <WH5333> garrison פְּלִשְׁתִּ֔ים <WH6430> and the Philistines' אָ֖ז <WH227> then בְּבֵ֥ית לָֽחֶם׃ <WH1035> [was] then at Bethlehem

[וַיִּתְאָו כ] (וַיִּתְאָ֥יו <WH183> desire ק) דָּוִ֖יד <WH1732> And David וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> and said מִ֚י <WH4310> Oh יַשְׁקֵ֣נִי <WH8248> Oh that one would give me drink מַ֔יִם <WH4325> of the water מִבּ֥וֹר <WH953> of the well בֵּֽית־ לֶ֖חֶם <WH1035> of Bethlehem אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which בַּשָּֽׁעַר׃ <WH8179> that [is] at the gate

וַיִּבְקְע֨וּ <WH1234> brake through הַשְּׁלֹשָׁ֜ה <WH7969> And the three בְּמַחֲנֵ֣ה <WH4264> the host פְלִשְׁתִּ֗ים <WH6430> of the Philistines וַיִּֽשְׁאֲבוּ־ <WH7579> and drew מַ֙יִם֙ <WH4325> water מִבּ֤וֹר <WH953> out of the well בֵּֽית־ לֶ֙חֶם֙ <WH1035> of Bethlehem אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which בַּשַּׁ֔עַר <WH8179> that [was] by the gate וַיִּשְׂא֖וּ <WH5375> and took וַיָּבִ֣אוּ <WH935> [it] and brought אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִ֑יד <WH1732> [it] to David וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not אָבָ֤ה <WH14> would דָוִיד֙ <WH1732> but David לִשְׁתּוֹתָ֔ם <WH8354> not drink וַיְנַסֵּ֥ךְ <WH5258> [of] it but poured it out אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> to the LORD

וַיֹּ֡אמֶר <WH559> And said חָלִילָה֩ <WH2486> forbid לִּ֨י מֵאֱלֹהַ֜י <WH430> My God מֵעֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> it me that I should do זֹ֗את <WH2063> this thing הֲדַ֣ם <WH1818> the blood הָאֲנָשִׁים֩ <WH582> of these men הָאֵ֨לֶּה <WH428> of these אֶשְׁתֶּ֤ה <WH8354> shall I drink בְנַפְשׁוֹתָם֙ <WH5315> any כִּ֣י <WH3588> for בְנַפְשׁוֹתָ֣ם <WH5315> they הֱבִיא֔וּם <WH935> they brought וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> not אָבָ֖ה <WH14> it Therefore he would לִשְׁתּוֹתָ֑ם <WH8354> not drink אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> These עָשׂ֔וּ <WH6213> it These things did שְׁלֹ֖שֶׁת <WH7969> these three הַגִּבּוֹרִֽים׃ <WH1368> mightiest

וְאַבְשַׁ֣י <WH52> And Abishai אֲחִֽי־ <WH251> the brother יוֹאָ֗ב <WH3097> of Joab ה֤וּא <WH1931> he הָיָה֙ <WH1961> become רֹ֣אשׁ <WH7218> he was chief הַשְּׁלוֹשָׁ֔ה <WH7969> of the three וְהוּא֙ <WH1931> and he עוֹרֵ֣ר <WH5782> for lifting up אֶת־ <WH853> חֲנִית֔וֹ <WH2595> his spear עַל־ <WH5921> against שְׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> against three מֵא֖וֹת <WH3967> hundred חָלָ֑ל <WH2490> begin [וְלֹא־ כ] (וְלֹו־ <WH3808> had a שֵׁ֖ם <WH8034> [them] and had a name ק) בַּשְּׁלוֹשָֽׁה׃ <WH7969> among the three

מִן־ <WH4480> at הַשְּׁלוֹשָׁ֤ה <WH7969> Of the three בַשְּׁנַ֙יִם֙ <WH8147> than the two נִכְבָּ֔ד <WH3513> he was more honourable וַיְהִ֥י <WH1961> and became לָהֶ֖ם לְשָׂ֑ר <WH8269> for he was their captain וְעַד־ <WH5704> against הַשְּׁלוֹשָׁ֖ה <WH7969> not to the [first] three לֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not בָֽא׃ <WH935> howbeit he attained ס

בְּנָיָ֨ה <WH1141> Benaiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son יְהוֹיָדָ֧ע <WH3077> of Jehoiada בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אִֽישׁ־ <WH376> man חַ֛יִל <WH2428> of a valiant רַב־ <WH7227> who had done many פְּעָלִ֖ים <WH6467> acts מִֽן־ <WH4480> at קַבְצְאֵ֑ל <WH6909> of Kabzeel ה֣וּא <WH1931> he הִכָּ֗ה <WH5221> he slew אֵ֣ת <WH853> שְׁנֵ֤י <WH8147> two אֲרִיאֵל֙ <WH739> lionlike men מוֹאָ֔ב <WH4124> of Moab וְ֠הוּא <WH1931> he יָרַ֞ד <WH3381> also he went down וְהִכָּ֧ה <WH5221> and slew אֶֽת־ <WH853> הָאֲרִ֛י <WH738> a lion בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> in הַבּ֖וֹר <WH953> a pit בְּי֥וֹם <WH3117> day הַשָּֽׁלֶג׃ <WH7950> in a snowy

וְהֽוּא־ <WH1931> He הִכָּה֩ <WH5221> And he slew אֶת־ <WH853> הָאִ֨ישׁ <WH376> a man הַמִּצְרִ֜י <WH4713> an Egyptian אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> A man מִדָּ֣ה ׀ <WH4060> of [great] stature חָמֵ֣שׁ <WH2568> five בָּאַמָּ֗ה <WH520> cubits וּבְיַ֨ד <WH3027> hand הַמִּצְרִ֤י <WH4713> high and in the Egyptian's חֲנִית֙ <WH2595> [was] a spear כִּמְנ֣וֹר <WH4500> beam אֹרְגִ֔ים <WH707> like a weaver's וַיֵּ֥רֶד <WH3381> and he went down אֵלָ֖יו <WH413> to him בַּשָּׁ֑בֶט <WH7626> to him with a staff וַיִּגְזֹ֤ל <WH1497> and plucked אֶֽת־ <WH853> הַחֲנִית֙ <WH2595> the spear מִיַּ֣ד <WH3027> hand הַמִּצְרִ֔י <WH4713> out of the Egyptian's וַיַּהַרְגֵ֖הוּ <WH2026> and slew בַּחֲנִיתֽוֹ׃ <WH2595> him with his own spear

אֵ֣לֶּה <WH428> These עָשָׂ֔ה <WH6213> These [things] did בְּנָיָ֖הוּ <WH1141> Benaiah בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְהוֹיָדָ֑ע <WH3077> of Jehoiada וְלוֹ־ שֵׁ֖ם <WH8034> and had the name בִּשְׁלוֹשָׁ֥ה <WH7969> among the three הַגִּבֹּרִֽים׃ <WH1368> mighties

מִן־ <WH4480> among הַשְּׁלוֹשִׁ֗ים <WH7970> among the thirty הִנּ֤וֹ <WH2005> behold נִכְבָּד֙ <WH3513> he was honourable ה֔וּא <WH1931> he וְאֶל־ <WH413> to הַשְּׁלוֹשָׁ֖ה <WH7969> not to the [first] three לֹא־ <WH3808> did not בָ֑א <WH935> but attained וַיְשִׂימֵ֥הוּ <WH7760> set דָוִ֖יד <WH1732> and David עַל־ <WH5921> over מִשְׁמַעְתּֽוֹ׃ <WH4928> him over his guard ס
